Texts.Eng: A beautiful and big blue bowl, deal for cooking work and eating.
Texts.Chs: 一个漂亮的蓝色大碗，用来做饭和吃饭。

Texts.Eng: A large footed clay bowl of alien design.
Texts.Chs: 异国设计的大脚粘土碗。

Texts.Eng: A luxury must-have for any Glitch lord's feast.
Texts.Chs: 对于任何有问题的领主盛宴来说，这都是一种奢侈品。

Texts.Eng: A multipurpose bowl that is both useful and pleasing to look at.
Texts.Chs: 一种既有用又美观的多用途碗。

Texts.Eng: An even larger ceramic bowl decorated in Mantizi fashion.
Texts.Chs: 一个更大的陶瓷碗，以甲虫族的风格装饰。

Texts.Eng: Big isn't always better, this bowl is without subtlety.
Texts.Chs: 大并不总是好的，这个碗没有微妙之处。

Texts.Eng: I guess other races can use it to prepare food, but we prefer to eat simply.
Texts.Chs: 我想其他种族也可以用它来准备食物，但我们更喜欢吃得简单。

Texts.Eng: It's easier to adjust to harsh foreign settings with something so familiar like this.
Texts.Chs: 用这样熟悉的东西更容易适应恶劣的外国环境。

Texts.Eng: Strange item. Intriguing colours. Very unusual!
Texts.Chs: 奇怪的东西。迷人的颜色。非常不寻常！

Texts.Eng: This bowl is as big as it is bland in appearance.
This bowl looks far more elaborate than the others I've seen.
Texts.Chs: 这个碗看起来比我见过的其他碗精致得多。

Texts.Eng: This bowl won't survive a dinner party with young Felinlings in attendance.
Texts.Chs: 这只碗在有小猫咪参加的晚宴上是撑不住的。

Texts.Eng: To defile the soil of Ithor just to make a base implement like this would be sacrilege!
Texts.Chs: 玷污伊索的土壤，或者仅仅制造一个像这样的基本工具，都是亵渎！
